Beggar.Name: Twitcher
Beggar.WelcomingMessage: - Hello there! - you`re hearing from a suspicious guy 'Twitcher'. He wants 3$ from you.
Beggar.KillingMessage: You`d better found any money for that beggar! After several hours of being chased by him, you DIED
Beggar.PlayingMessage: - Oh THANK YOU Sooooooooo much my dear friend!
